amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to conduct the survey, conducted by the Secretary of Commerce, commonly referred to as the American Community Survey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to conduct the survey, conducted by the Secretary of Commerce, commonly referred to as the "American Community Survey".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Webster amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 190 (Roll no. 232).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Webster amendment (A044) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 190 (Roll no. 232).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Webster.
